title: Google\Cloud\ApiKeys\V2\Restrictions
name: Restrictions
description:
Describes the restrictions on the key.

Generated from protobuf message google.api.apikeys.v2.Restrictions

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.browser_key_restrictions
params.description: The HTTP referrers (websites) that are allowed to use the key.

params.name: data.server_key_restrictions
params.description: The IP addresses of callers that are allowed to use the key.

params.name: data.android_key_restrictions
params.description: The Android apps that are allowed to use the key.

params.name: data.ios_key_restrictions
params.description: The iOS apps that are allowed to use the key.

params.name: data.api_targets
params.description: A restriction for a specific service and optionally one or more specific methods. Requests are allowed if they match any of these restrictions. If no restrictions are specified, all targets are allowed.
